review_blob: surprisingly good, roasted and burnt malts with a nice finish. definitely rivals some good porters and dark lagers
nice tasty brew,toast, roasty, chocolate, a nice body of malts. thought there would be a signifficantly more cherryish taste though. black, cloudy, tan foam,
has that fruit beer taste youd expect but leaves a pleasant beer taste on the palate. i might like this too much as i love strawberry but dont get me wrong there is a time and a place for fruit beer.
first sip i got a strong coffee flavour followed by a smooth roasted flavour. As far as porters go, this one is highly recommended
